devdoc.author: Matheus Pagani
devdoc.custom:teaching: This is a contract meant for teaching only
devdoc.details: This contract implements a relatively weak randomness source, since there is no cliff period between the randao reveal and the actual usage in this contract

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

closeLottery().details: Anyone can call this function at any time after the closing time

params._betFee: Amount of tokens required for placing a bet that goes for the owner pool
params._betPrice: Amount of tokens required for placing a bet that goes for the prize pool
params._purchaseRatio: Amount of tokens given per ETH paid
params.tokenName: Name of the token used for payment
params.tokenSymbol: Symbol of the token used for payment

getRandomNumber().details: This only works after The Merge

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

purchaseTokens().details: This implementation is prone to rounding problems

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: A very simple lottery contract

bet().notice: Charges the bet price and creates a new bet slot with the sender's address

betFee().notice: Amount of tokens required for placing a bet that goes for the owner pool

betPrice().notice: Amount of tokens required for placing a bet that goes for the prize pool

betsClosingTime().notice: Timestamp of the lottery next closing date and time

betsOpen().notice: Flag indicating whether the lottery is open for bets or not

closeLottery().notice: Closes the lottery and calculates the prize, if any

getRandomNumber().notice: Returns a random number calculated from the previous block randao

openBets(uint256).notice: Opens the lottery for receiving bets

ownerPool().notice: Amount of tokens in the owner pool

paymentToken().notice: Address of the token used as payment for the bets

prize(address).notice: Mapping of prize available for withdraw for each account

prizePool().notice: Amount of tokens in the prize pool

prizeWithdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws `amount` from that accounts's prize pool

purchaseRatio().notice: Amount of tokens given per ETH paid

purchaseTokens().notice: Gives tokens based on the amount of ETH sent

returnTokens(uint256).notice: Burns `amount` tokens and give the equivalent ETH back to user

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract for running a very simple lottery
